>
[Reinforced Chassis](/Feats.aspx?ID=3095) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Automaton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=398" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 40 <sup>2.0</sup>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) An automaton character with the Reinforced Chassis feat uses their unarmored proficiency._

</column>

---

Your body is designed to be particularly resilient. Your chassis is made from reinforced armor plating that grants a +3 item bonus to AC with a Dexterity cap of +1. If you are at least 5th level, the item bonus increases to +4 and at 10th level it increases to +5. You can never wear other armor or remove your chassis; however, you still don’t become fatigued from sleeping. Finally, you can etch armor runes onto your chassis.

**Enhancement** Your chassis becomes difficult to overcome. You gain the Chassis Deflection reaction.
